_description: Observability and monitoring MCP server configurations

setup_commands.dynatrace: claude-workspace mcp add dynatrace --api-key DT_ENVIRONMENT -- npx -y @dynatrace-oss/dynatrace-mcp-server@latest

notes.sentry: Uses OAuth - authenticate via /mcp in Claude Code after adding
notes.grafana: You will be prompted for a Bearer token. Generate one in Grafana settings.
notes.honeycomb: Uses OAuth â€” authenticate via /mcp in Claude Code after adding. Requires Honeycomb Intelligence (enabled on all plans). EU region: use https://mcp.eu1.honeycomb.io/mcp
notes.honeycomb-api-key: You will be prompted for a Bearer token. Use KEY_ID:SECRET_KEY from your Honeycomb API settings. EU region: use https://mcp.eu1.honeycomb.io/mcp
notes.dynatrace: You will be prompted for DT_ENVIRONMENT (your tenant URL, e.g. https://abc12345.apps.dynatrace.com). Uses browser OAuth by default. For headless/CI use, also set DT_PLATFORM_TOKEN. Required scopes: app-engine:apps:run, storage:buckets:read, davis-copilot:conversations:execute.
